hanzi-su-wiki:
傍

Значения

Сторона; у, около, рядом, кроме того

Мнемоника

  • Справа — сторона 方, на которой стоит 立 квадрат, боковая поверхность. Человек 亻, прислонившийся к стороне чего-либо для отдыха.
  • Человек 亻, стоящий на другой стороне 旁.
purpleculture_pinyin:
bàng
near; approaching; to depend on; (slang) to have an intimate relationship with sb; Taiwan pr. [pang2], [bang1], [bang4]
возле; приближение; зависит от; (сленг) иметь близкие отношения с кем-то; Тайвань пр. [pang2], [bang1], [bang4]
rtega_mnemonic:
傍傍RSbeside, near, close, bystander, depend
  • person 亻 standing on the side 旁
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: Someone 亻 by your side 旁; 旁 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
傍晚 [ bàng wǎn ]: in the evening; when night falls; towards evening; at night fall; at dusk
依傍 [ yī bàng ]: to rely on; to depend on; to imitate (a model); to base a work (on some model)
依山傍水 [ yī shān bàng shuǐ ]: mountains on one side and water on the other
傍午 [ bàng wǔ ]: towards noon; around midday
傍亮 [ bàng liàng ]: dawn; daybreak

heisig_chinese_memo: In Japan, the emperor is a bystander, close to any normal person - he stands on his crown but can't really affect the direction of the country.
heisig_constituent: bystander, person, traffic cop, fez, vase, stand up, crown, compass, direction
Keyword_KANJIDIC: bystander, side, besides, while, nearby, 3rd person
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: прохожий, сторона, кроме того, в то время, рядом, третье лицо
koohiiStory1: In Japan, the emperor is a bystander - he stands on his crown but can´t really affect the direction of the country. (thx shimouma).
koohiiStory2: Mr. T is in the street, standing up, wearing an golden crown and a compass in his hand... he´s asking the bystander if they know how to get to buckingham palace (!).
kunYomi: かたわ.ら、わき、おか-、はた、そば
jp_example_words: 傍ら(かたわら): beside(s), while, nearby
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The leader is standing funny, facing a direction nearby. He can't go far because there's obviously something wrong with his feet. He's stuck nearby, very close to your side.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the leader very close to your side. He's looking off into the distance, a distance he'll never get to because all he can do is stand there with his messed up feet.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You decide to bring the leader to a nearby bowling (ぼう) alley. It's really close and you can stay right by his side as he throws bowling balls and gets his anger out.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture the leader bowling nearby. You keep him close by, you never know when he'll fall over and need your help.
Ru_Meaning: bystander, side, besides, while, nearby, third person
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), 化 (превращаться), 并, 冖 (ва), 方 (сторона), 立 (стоять)
Ru_trainchinese: bàng: (глаг) быть рядом, находиться поблизости; полагаться на
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man (亻) with the way of standing covered (旁) is a bystander
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In Japan, the emperor is a bystander, close to any normal person - he stands on his crown but can't really affect the direction of the country.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " person " and " side ", the original meaning is side and near. "Shuowen": "Nearly. From the people, from the sidelines." "Historical Records-The Biography of Prime Minister Zhang": "It was when the prime minister entered the dynasty, but he lived above him, there is a ritual of negligence."

" Pong " can mean something other than itself. The Southern Song Dynasty Liu Yiqing's "Shi Shuo Xin Yu-Su Hui": "Xuan Ying cried and felt sour."

" Pong " can be extended to take advantage of it. The Northern Wei Dynasty Jia Sixie "Qi Min Yao Shu‧ Planting Pock-Shot": "The Book of Pan Sheng said: "Plant hemp, and reconcile the field. In late February and early March, plant it in the rain.""

" Pong " also means to follow and follow. The Northern Wei Dynasty Li Daoyuan's "Shui Jing Annotation-Holy Water": "In the old days, there was a Shamen Shi Huimi who had a good spirit, and tasted a bonfire to find it. There are more than three miles of acupuncture points by the water, and the acupoints are divided into two."

" Pong " also means attachment and support. "Two Moments Pai An Surprise" Volume 7: "The son-in-law is chosen by the guardian. He is quite successful, and he can be surrounded for life."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " person " and " side ", the original meaning is next to and near.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「旁」聲，本義為旁邊、臨近。《說文》：「近也。从人，旁聲。」《史記‧張丞相列傳》：「是時丞相入朝，而通居上傍，有怠慢之禮。」

　　「傍」可表示本身之外的，別的。南朝宋劉義慶《世說新語‧夙惠》：「玄應聲慟哭，酸感傍人。」

　　「傍」可引申為趁着。北魏賈思勰《齊民要術‧種麻子》：「《氾勝之書》曰：『種麻，豫調和田。二月下旬，三月上旬，傍雨種之。』」

　　「傍」也表示順着、沿着。北魏酈道元《水經注‧聖水》：「昔有沙門釋惠彌者，好精物隱，嘗篝火尋之，傍水入穴三里有餘，穴分為二。」

　　「傍」還表示依附、依托。《二刻拍案驚奇》卷七：「婿是守公所擇，頗為得人，終身可傍矣。」
humanum_short_description: 從「人」，「旁」聲，本義為旁邊、臨近。

傍ら(かたわら): beside(s), while, nearby

從「 人 」，「 旁 」聲，本義為旁邊、臨近。《說文》：「近也。从人，旁聲。」《史記‧張丞相列傳》：「是時丞相入朝，而通居上傍，有怠慢之禮。」 「 傍 」可表示本身之外的，別的。南朝宋劉義慶《世說新語‧夙惠》：「玄應聲慟哭，酸感傍人。」 「 傍 」可引申為趁着。北魏賈思勰《齊民要術‧種麻子》：「《氾勝之書》曰：『種麻，豫調和田。二月下旬，三月上旬，傍雨種之。』」 「 傍 」也表示順着、沿着。北魏酈道元《水經注‧聖水》：「昔有沙門釋惠彌者，好精物隱，嘗篝火尋之，傍水入穴三里有餘，穴分為二。」 「 傍 」還表示依附、依托。《二刻拍案驚奇》卷七：「婿是守公所擇，頗為得人，終身可傍矣。」
From the sound of " person" and " side", the original meaning is side and near. "Shuowen": "Nearly. From the people, from the sidelines." "Historical Records-The Biography of Prime Minister Zhang": "It was when the prime minister entered the dynasty, but he lived above him, there is a ritual of negligence." " Pong" can mean something other than itself. The Southern Song Dynasty Liu Yiqing's "Shi Shuo Xin Yu-Su Hui": "Xuan Ying cried and felt sour." " Pong" can be extended to take advantage of it. The Northern Wei Dynasty Jia Sixie "Qi Min Yao Shu‧ Planting Pock-Shot": "The Book of Pan Sheng said: "Plant hemp, and reconcile the field. In late February and early March, plant it in the rain."" " Pong" also means to follow and follow. The Northern Wei Dynasty Li Daoyuan's "Shui Jing Annotation-Holy Water": "In the old days, there was a Shamen Shi Huimi who had a good spirit, and tasted a bonfire to find it. There are more than three miles of acupuncture points by the water, and the acupoints are divided into two." " Pong" also means attachment and support. "Two Moments Pai An Surprise" Volume 7: "The son-in-law is chosen by the guardian. He is quite successful, and he can be surrounded for life."

傍字的基本解释

傍
bàng
靠：依山傍水。
临近：傍晚。傍黑。傍亮。

傍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［páng］
［《廣韻》步光切，平唐，並。］
(1)旁边；侧近。
(2)本身之外的，别的。
(3)广。见“傍通”、“傍接”、“傍概”等。
(4)汉字的偏旁。
(5)偏颇；邪僻。参见“傍門”。
(6)偏斜，仄曲。参见“傍蹊”。
(7)见“傍午”。
(8)见“傍偟”。
(9)见“傍薄”。
(10)通“方”。逆，倒转。参见“傍戟”。
(11)通“訪”。访求。参见“傍薦”。
[②]［bàng］
［《廣韻》蒲浪切，去宕，並。］
“並2”的被通假字。
(1)贴近；靠近。
(2)伴随，陪伴。
(3)引申为趁着。
(4)顺着；沿着。
(5)依附；依托。
[③]［bēng］
［《集韻》晡横切，平庚，幫。］
见“傍3傍”。

傍字的英文翻译

◎ 傍
be close to, draw near

傍字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傍； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页113第02
【唐韻】步光切【集韻】【韻會】蒲光切。?通旁。【說文】近也。【廣韻】側也。　又姓。唐北地羌豪傍企本。　又【集韻】補朗切，音縍。左右也。【賈子保傅篇】成王之生，仁者養之，孝者强之，四聖傍之。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?蒲浪切，音?。【正韻】倚也。【集韻】亦近也。或作並䧛。　又【正韻】補耕切，音綳。【詩·小雅】四牡彭彭，王事傍傍。【朱傳】傍傍然不得已也。

傍字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
傍字的起名意思

意指靠近，临近。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［páng］
["Guangyun" step light cut, Ping Tang, and merge. ]
(1) Side; side close.
(2) Other than itself.
(3) Wide. See "Pangtong", "Pangjie", "Pangge", etc.
(4) Radicals of Chinese characters.
(5) Partial; evil. See "by the door".
(6) Skew, squiggly. See "pongqi".
(7) See "afternoon".
(8) See "Bangcheng".
(9) See "poor-poor".
(10) Link "Fang". Reverse, reverse. See "pong halberd".
(11) Through "visit". Visit request. See "Recommendation".
[②]［bàng］
["Guangyun" Pu Lang cuts, goes down, and merges. ]
The word "bin 2" was passed falsely.
(1) Close to; close to.
(2) Accompany, accompany.
(3) The extension is taking advantage of it.
(4) Follow; follow.
(5) Dependence; dependence.
[③] [bēng]
["Ji Yun" Ho crosscut, Ping Geng, Bang. ]
See "Pong 3 Pong".

be close to, draw near

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　bang; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 113 02
[Tang Yun] Step light cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Pu Guang cut. ? Bypass. [Said the text] Nearly too. [Guang Yun] Side also.　Another last name. In the north of Tang Dynasty, Qiang Hao is close to the enterprise.　[Jiyun] to make up and cut, the sound is 縍. Left and right too. [Jia Zi Bao Fu Chapter] The life of a king is raised by the benevolent, strong by the filial, and by the four sages.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Pu Lang cut, sound?. [Zheng Yun] Lean also. 【Jiyun】It's also near. Or make a merger.　 [Zheng Yun] Supplement farming and cutting, sound stubborn. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Four males and Pengpeng, Wang Shibang. [Zhu Chuan] As a last resort.

Near
Name meaning
Means near, near.
bàng, páng, bāng
I гл.
1) bàng опираться, полагаться; приставать, причаливать
船傍了岸 лодка причалила к берегу
2) близиться, приближаться к...; дело идёт к...; также глагол- предлог к наступлению, перед, к
傍天亮 к рассвету, перед рассветом
傍落太阳的时候儿 перед закатом солнца
3) вм. 帮 (помогать; содействовать)
4) сопровождать, составлять компанию
他专傍洋人，寻机出国。 Он увивается вокруг иностранцев в надежде получить шанс поехать за границу.
5) иметь с кем-л. интимные отношения
他们俩已暗地里傍了一年了。 Они уже год как в интимных отношениях.
II páng вм. 旁 (бок, сторона, близкий; ответвление; посторонний, прочий; боковая часть иероглифа)
III собств. páng
Пан (фамилия)
Radicals: ｲ, 立, 方  (leader, stand, direction)
Meaning Mnemonic
The leader is standing funny, facing a direction nearby. He can't go far because there's obviously something wrong with his feet. He's stuck nearby, very close to your side.
Picture the leader very close to your side. He's looking off into the distance, a distance he'll never get to because all he can do is stand there with his messed up feet.
Reading Mnemonic
You decide to bring the leader to a nearby bowling (ぼう) alley. It's really close and you can stay right by his side as he throws bowling balls and gets his anger out.
Picture the leader bowling nearby. You keep him close by, you never know when he'll fall over and need your help.
